title: Quantitative Local State of Charge Mapping by Operando Electrochemical Fluorescence Microscopy in Porous Electrodes

We introduce operando quantitative electrochemical fluorescence state of charge mapping (QEFSM), a non-invasive technique to study operating electrochemical systems along with a new design of optically transparent microfluidic redox flow...
